name: The Disciples of the Full Moon
name_original: The Disciples of the Full Moon
description:
The Disciples of the Full Moon is a retro survival horror made for the Reload Magazine Game Jam #1.

The game was made in 2 weeks.

STORY:

Greetings, Mr Lusk.

Dear Sir, I have begun noticing that the inhabitants of the city are turning into monsters at night.

I don't know why exactly, but I believe it has something to do with the full moon.

The full moon turns people into bloodthirsty monsters, I call them the disciples of the full moon.

Tonight, I will take a walk, with my cleaver by my side for protection.

I hope it will be a fascinating walk, Sir.

Best Wishes, Jack.

1888 East End, London.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Attack

1, 2, 3 or MOUSE WHEEL - Change weapon

R - Reload

E - Doors

Built in Easy FPS Editor v1.5 Lite engine
